content: Software is close to moving from a designers' plate to a developers' with a matter or click or certain logic. As of now, translating a visual design into code is as the word implies, a translation. This takes time and effort and some information is usually lost. I mean, fontend engineers — depending on their personal gusto — either really like the visual aspect and care about it fundamentally or they don’t. For the latter, this translation is rather a bore than a pleasure. The translation into components needs thorough thought, but will probably be solved through clever algorithms.
